sentence.Network_en: Police had reportedly searched his flat and found incriminating evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 据传闻，警方已经搜查了他的公寓并发现了他涉案的证据。

sentence.Network_en: The mine reportedly had an accident rate triple the national average.
sentence.Network_cn: 据报道，该矿事故发生率是全国平均水平的3倍。

sentence.Network_en: Thousands of people battled with police and several were reportedly wounded.
sentence.Network_cn: 数千人与警方发生冲突，据报道有数人在冲突中受伤。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语广播词汇（3）|无忧教育 ... replacement n. 归还，取代 reportedly adv. 据传说，据报道 reporter n. 报告人，记者.
Artists reportedly were afraid to draw them ., 据传闻 , 画家们都害怕画这些.
In 2008 China reportedly browbeat ExxonMobil and BP into stopping exploration in Vietnamese waters ., 在 2008年据说中国恫吓埃克森美孚和英国石油 , 要求其停止在中越争议水域的探测.
recruit新兵，新警员reportedly据报道, 据传说lenient惩罚或执法时）宽大的，宽容的，仁慈的.

list.abs: in 1992 , the Chinese authorities reportedly authorized a program for studying the development of aircraft carrier .1992年，中国当局报核定学习纲要发展航空母舰。
Sex on a pool table or a lesbian reportedly scored higher points ., 性别对一批表或同性恋据说得分更高点.
Some customers reportedly used several cards to withdraw money ., 有些顾客报告用几张卡取钱.
the Reds are at alternatives after Xabi Alonso reportedly requested a transfer to Real Madrid this week .利物浦正在寻找替代品，阿隆索据说要求这个星期转会到皇家马德里队。

entry.def: If you say that something is reportedly true, you mean that someone has said that it is true, but you have no direct evidence of it.

example.ex: More than two hundred people have reportedly been killed in the past week's fighting...
example.tran: 据说在上一周的战斗中有200多人丧生。

example.ex: Now Moscow has reportedly agreed that the sale can go ahead...
example.tran: 据说现在莫斯科已经同意继续销售。

means.word_mean: 1. according to reports or other information;

sentences.sentence: "she was reportedly his mistress for many years"

auth_sentence.content: Woods and his wife Elin are reportedly in counseling.
auth_sentence.res_content: Woods and his wife Elin are reportedly in counseling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Woods and his wife Elin are reportedly in counseling.

auth_sentence.content: Police and court guards reportedly did little to intervene.
auth_sentence.res_content: Police and court guards reportedly did little to intervene.

auth_sentence.content: He reportedly wrestled with the devil in his cell.
auth_sentence.res_content: He reportedly wrestled with the devil in his cell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He reportedly wrestled with the devil in his cell.
